articles.title: Regular mouthwash can kill coronavirus within 30 seconds, UK study reveals - Moneycontrol
articles.description: During a 30-second exposure, two rinses containing cetylpyridinium chloride and a third with ethanol/ethyl lauroyl arginate eliminated live virus.
articles.content:
A study conducted in the United Kingdom has found that a basic, over-the-counter mouthwash can kill the novel coronavirus within 30 seconds of exposure.
